name: AdMail – Back in-stock notifier for WooCommerce
author: Ales

sections.description:
AdMail is a powerful tool to help boost your sales and enhance customer experience. With AdMail, your customers can subscribe to out-of-stock products by providing their email address and receive an email notification when the product is back in stock.

AdMail is compatible with all WooCommerce product types, including simple, variable, and grouped products. You can customize the subscription form to appear as a popup, and choose from a variety of email templates. You can also enable/disable the subscription form for guests, provide an unsubscribe option for users, and enable/disable email submissions automatically.

AdMail prioritizes speed and performance, and your customers will enjoy faster performance thanks to the Ajax feature implemented.
sections.installation:
Install AdMail from the WordPress plugins screen by searching for “AdMail”.
Activate AdMail through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress.
Make sure WooCommerce is activated.

Alternatively, you can upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate AdMail through the “Plugins” screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I install AdMail?

To install AdMail, follow these steps:

From your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins.
Click on "Add new" and search for "AdMail".
Choose "AdMail - Back in Stock Notifier" and click install.
After installation, click activate.

Is AdMail compatible with all themes?

AdMail is compatible with all themes that respect the coding standards of WordPress set by its Codex.

Does AdMail work with custom single product templates?

Yes, AdMail works with custom single product templates that use WooCommerce built-in hooks/filters/shortcodes.

Will I have to send emails manually?

No, AdMail can take care of the entire process, collecting subscriptions and sending emails to your customers when a product is back in stock. Simply enable the “Auto Submission” option in the plugin settings.

Can I buy a custom email template?

Yes, you can contact our team at admail@aleswebs.com to request a quote for a custom email template.

Is AdMail compatible with all WooCommerce product types?

Yes, AdMail is compatible with simple, variable, and grouped products.

What is the difference between the free and pro versions of the AdMail plugin?

The free version of AdMail enables your customers to subscribe to out-of-stock products and receive an email notification when the product is back in stock. The pro version of AdMail offers additional tools, such as sending promotional emails to inform your customers about new products and coupons.
sections.changelog:
1.6.4

  • Fixed minor issues and improved compatibility with WordPress 6.5.

1.6.3

  • Fixed minor issues and improved overall compatibility.

1.6.1

  • Fixed minor bugs and improved overall compatibility.

1.6.0

  • Added multiple new settings for customization options.
  • Added option to send confirmation emails.
  • Improved compatibility with latest WordPress versions.
  • Added support for multilingual translations.
  • Added ability to exclude products by tag names.
  • Improved subscriptions table.
  • Enhanced subscription form design and functionality.

1.5.6

  • Resolved the Outlook email rendering issue.
  • Introduced additional settings for enhanced customization.
  • Fixed minor bugs and improved overall compatibility.

1.5.5

  • Improved character set handling to ensure proper display of non-ASCII characters.

1.5.4

  • Fixed minor issues.
  • Added the possibility to display the subscription form by shortcode.
sections.screenshots:
1. AdMail subscription form Customizable subscription form with fast Ajax-based subscription and option to display as a pop-up..

  2. Dashboard - Overview Track subscriptions analytics and identify the most in-demand products with ease.

  3. Manage subscriptions Easily manage your subscriptions with AdMail. Select, send notices, move to trash, and delete subscriptions effortlessly.

  4. General Settings Customize the AdMail plugin to your exact needs with multiple settings options to choose from.

  5. Email Settings Easily personalize your notification emails with a store name, logo, subject line, email address, and other settings through AdMail's customization options.

  6. AdMail Notification Email Choose the email template that best suits your brand, or request a custom template for a personalized touch.
sections.reviews:
Great plugin and support

By nnmedia on April 5, 2024

Great support, fix in one day. Really good customization options.

Best back in stock plugin

By albertoinbox on March 19, 2024

This plugin has all the right stuff in all the right places.

All necessary options and relevant customizable settings are available. But the ability to send emails using your website's default template really makes it the best option out there.

Good job Ales!

Great plugin!

By annamarie on February 24, 2024

Very easy interface. Loved the Overview section showing subscription statistics. Also liked that I could download the Collected Emails as a CSV.

Simple and good

By Spikee on December 20, 2023

working good, fast support

Top notch support

By bradmlibi on November 18, 2023

I just started using the AdMail pro and needed to contact their support, they are fast and professional and I'm satisfied with the plugin, it is simple and very easy to work with.

Was great, but stopped working

By Przemek (przemyslawcioch) on September 6, 2023

It's amazing plugin but after new wc release it crashes product page.

also sending emails doesn't end with correct msg.

A great plugin.

By billysteward on April 5, 2023

This plugin is fast, free, and easy to use, fulfilling its intended purpose effectively.
